tool_description: Converts celestial longitude positions to chart coordinates for visualization, handling different chart orientations and scaling.

chart_radius.description: Base radius for chart wheel in pixels (50-500)

error_messages: Invalid radius: Chart radius must be between 50 and 500 pixels.
Incorrect house data: Must provide exactly 12 house cusp positions.
Invalid longitude values: All longitude values must be between 0 and 360 degrees.
usage: Input planet positions and house cusps from previous calculations, optionally set chart radius. Converts astronomical positions to chart wheel coordinates.

planet_x_coords.description: X coordinates for planet positions on chart wheel

planet_y_coords.description: Y coordinates for planet positions on chart wheel

house_x_coords.description: X coordinates for house cusp positions

house_y_coords.description: Y coordinates for house cusp positions
